questions.question: We use dynamic programming approach when?

answer_choices.C: The problem can be reduced to the 3-SAT problem

questions.question: What is memoization in the context of dynamic programming?

answer_choices.A: A technique to write memory-efficient programs.
answer_choices.B: A way to avoid solving subproblems by storing their solutions and reusing them.
answer_choices.C: A process of converting recursive algorithms into iterative ones
answer_choices.D: A method of analyzing the time complexity of algorithms

questions.answer: A way to avoid solving subproblems by storing their solutions and reusing them.

When an interrupt occurs, an operating system

answer_choices.B: always changes state of interrupted process to 'blocked' and schedules another process
answer_choices.C: always resumes execution of interrupted process after processing the interrupt
answer_choices.D: may change the state of interrupted process to 'blocked'and schedule another process

questions.answer: may change the state of interrupted process to 'blocked'and schedule another process
